html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-04522023-05-18HC
ActCanada Consumer Product Safety Act
SubjectCarriages and Strollers Regulations
PrecisCARRIAGES AND STROLLERS REGULATIONS in order to (1) align with the mechanical requirements in other jurisdictions through an ambulatory incorporation by reference of international standards, including a period during which stakeholders may meet the mechanical requirements of either the previous or new version of an international standard; (2) align surface coating materials requirements and toxicological requirements with the Toys Regulations; (3) align phthalates requirements with the Phthalates Regulations; (4) update and clarify terminology relating to information and warnings; and (5) align the information and warning requirements in other jurisdictions through an ambulatory incorporation by reference of international standards.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0101 Publication Date: 2023-06-07
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Carriages and Strollers Regulations
precis: CARRIAGES AND STROLLERS REGULATIONS in order to (1) align with the mechanical requirements in other jurisdictions through an ambulatory incorporation by reference of international standards, including a period during which stakeholders may meet the mechanical requirements of either the previous or new version of an international standard; (2) align surface coating materials requirements and toxicological requirements with the Toys Regulations; (3) align phthalates requirements with the Phthalates Regulations; (4) update and clarify terminology relating to information and warnings; and (5) align the information and warning requirements in other jurisdictions through an ambulatory incorporation by reference of international standards.
